linux.command: cd /tmp && curl -LO https://jpa.kapsi.fi/nanopb/download/nanopb-0.4.4-linux-x86.tar.gz && tar xvf /tmp/nanopb-0.4.4-linux-x86.tar.gz -C ${workspaceFolder} && chmod u+x ${workspaceFolder}/nanopb-0.4.4-linux-x86/generator-bin/protoc
${workspaceFolder}/nanopb-0.4.4-linux-x86/generator-bin/nanopb_generator -I ${workspaceFolder}/config messages.proto && mv messages.pb.c src/ && mv messages.pb.h include/
